name: diamond-storm
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply boost the user's Defense stat.
